name: Star Wars
description:
Developed new modules, including the Star Wars Databank, and updated static designs to support fluid responsive states

Data modeling and manipulation, strategic templates to minimize code bloat

Used client-side code and advanced css animations for visual elements whenever possible, reducing load times and page weight

Developed several complex Sass mixins for managing configurable styling, including the configurations for the dark gray containers with notches and graphics

Interactive global navigation which includes a compressing banner animation on scroll in large browser widths, and an animated light saber toggle in the hamburger menu

2015 Webby Award Nomination: Celebrity/Fan Website

2017 Webby Award Winner: People's Voice, Movie & Film Website
